name: Pools of Darkness
description:
Pools of Darkness is a RPG game developed by Strategic Simulations. It came out on 01-01-1991. Strategic Simulations published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Pools of Darkness on Classic Macintosh, Commodore / Amiga and PC. You can purchase the game on GOG.
Glen Cureton produced the game. It was directed by Victor Penman. It was scored by David Govett and George Alistair Sanger.
